name: Kingsoft Office Suite Free 2013
short_description: Free office suite provided by Kingsoft Office is a practical alternative to expensive office software. You will never think it could have such amazing features. Kingsoft Office Free adopts a newly designed interface, which can be switched to the classic MS office interface. It takes user experience into full consideration--specialized paragraph tools, drag-and-drop table tools and tabs mode make document editing more easy. In addition to functions, it has greatly-improved compatibility with MS office in the latest version. You have no need to download a compatibility pack for office 2003/2007/2010/2013.
summary: Free, small and fast kingsoft office 2013
